channel.title: Rune Rebellion
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZQjxr.jpg[/img]
n0m n0m n0m n0m n0m
Game Objective: Make features most Project Insanity's do not have and program them perfectly.
What am I going to do? Well first I'm going to spend a month or so just adding some great content into this source and client. I will be soloing this development! (I don't trust some of the people on here anymore sadly.) I'm not for sure if I'm going to host or release. If I can get my hands on some extra cash I will buy a VPS and host this. But If I cannot I will consider releasing it or letting it rot on my computer. Oh and this is a spawn server. It will not be one of those servers you can spawn anything you like but more like a spawn/eco there will be item restrictions if I host.
Features:
Very nice bank with working Interfaces Bank Pins Item Search (Ty Baranka) Grand Exchange (40%?) Fist of Guthix (70%) Castle wars (I got a 95% Castle Wars base I will be adding soon.) Cash Bag (With Banking and shops) Great 508 Maps 600+ Data.... Slow Cache download (<--- loael) Good Prayer base. 18 Skills working. 7 Bosses I think. Zombies Swearing Censor Assault Wars Barb Assault (Delta Version) Working Pest Control (Including interfaces) Warriors Guild Summoning Shitty Hunter but works Alot more trust me...
[b][size=24pt]Key Features:[/size][/b]
[b][size=18pt]Fist of Guthix[/size][/b]
How it works? Go to Fist of Guthix Lobby > Enter Game (Must have 2 people to start) > System Randomly Picks Hunter and Hunt > Right now theres no safe PVP in the arena so I have to use ::kill command to win but I will add Safe PVP soon really soon.
- Add Interfaces - Make working stones. - Make all global objects in area accessible. - Add tokens - Add Ratings. - Make Perfect interfaces. - Add F.O.G Shop (Easy doing last...) - Code Stone so it adds charge. - Add PVP to F.O.G Arena (Safe PVP of course)
F.O.G Media:
Interfaces working! Wearing the stone but you can't see it thats why its yellow up there. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uoUsM.png[/img]
When the game ends. Your score rounds to determine how much tokens you get. (2280 = 23 It rounds to the nearest whole. Rating no work atm :() [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q7yIv.png[/img]
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b][size=18pt]Grand Exchange[/size][/b]
- Add Interfaces - Program buying and selling perfectly. - Make Npc's - Add Collect and History - Dump G.E Map Data.
Grand Exchange Media:
None atm to tired going to add tomorrow.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Other Media:
Summoning: Interfaces work great. Need to add more pouches though only got a couple.. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K13mE.png[/img]
Castle Wars lobby: Just wanted to show this cause I think its sexy xD. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EgMNn.png[/img]
Grand Exchange searching! 100% Just working on G.E Interfaces [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aEBhU.png[/img]
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b][size=18pt]Videos: [/size][/b]
none atm
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[code]Comments, Concerns, Coupons? [/code] ;D
(And No need to post the skills things cause they all work fine.)
[size=1pt]+1 for no ugly gameframe[/size]

item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

n0m n0m n0m n0m n0m

Game Objective: Make features most Project Insanity’s do not have and program them perfectly.

What am I going to do? Well first I’m going to spend a month or so just adding some great content into this source and client. I will be soloing this development! (I don’t trust some of the people on here anymore sadly.) I’m not for sure if I’m going to host or release. If I can get my hands on some extra cash I will buy a VPS and host this. But If I cannot I will consider releasing it or letting it rot on my computer. Oh and this is a spawn server. It will not be one of those servers you can spawn anything you like but more like a spawn/eco there will be item restrictions if I host.

Features:

Very nice bank with working Interfaces
Bank Pins
Item Search (Ty Baranka)

Alot more trust me…

[size=24pt]Key Features:[/size]

[size=18pt]Fist of Guthix[/size]

How it works? Go to Fist of Guthix Lobby > Enter Game (Must have 2 people to start) > System Randomly Picks Hunter and Hunt > Right now theres no safe PVP in the arena so I have to use ::kill command to win but I will add Safe PVP soon really soon.

When the game ends. Your score rounds to determine how much tokens you get. (2280 = 23 It rounds to the nearest whole. Rating no work atm :()
